name: Bear Knuckle Boxing
description:
Made for MisJam in 48 hours. Requires 2 controllers and players. About

Bear Knuckle Boxing is a local multiplayer fighting game where you only go down when you give up!

Box with the bears, take down your opponent and hope they stay down!

Tools
  • Unity
    • iTween
    • Fungus
  • Photoshop
  • Aseprite
  • FMOD
Credits
